column1: '''''Other Hands'' 29/30''' is a double-issue of ''[[Other Hands]]''
column2: a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]]''. The theme of the issue is "Southern Middle-earth"

column1: *Magic Feature: Words of Command - (Andy Mack) [concrete game mechanics for WoCs; 3 pgs]
*An Alternative Continental Map for MERP - ([[Thomas Morwinsky]]) [notes on the design of the new Endor continent map; 2 pgs + map insert]

column3: and development stats; 9 pgs + map insert]

column1: *Mithril Feature: The Mirror of Fire - (Chris Seeman) [2 pgs]
*The Sisters of Ishtra - (Cory Rushton) [background and stats for a southron religious order; 4 pgs]
*Supplement: The Realm of Bellakar - (Eric Dubourg) [history for a completely new realm in southern Middle-earth; 56 pgs + map insert]
